mapper.insert: insert into tbl_program (pcourse, roomname, torder, opendate, closedate, maximum, persongroupid, category) values (#{pcourse}, #{roomname} , #{torder}, #{opendate},#{closedate},#{maximum}, #{persongroupid}, #{category})
mapper.select: select tsno, subname, subgrade, tname from (select * from tbl_teacher_subject where tsno in (select tsno from tbl_curriculum where pno = #{pno}) ) t, tbl_subject s, tbl_teacher a where t.subno = s.subno and t.tid = a.tid order by subname asc, subgrade desc
